posts.post_title: FS: T206 Signed Paddy Livingston BAS SOLD
posts.post_content:
Very nice card with a beautiful signature across the back. BAS Authenticated and slabbed and slab is mint. The price is SOLD PayPal friends/family please. Thanks for looking at my sale.

Joe K
